description: '''Moderat''' is a German [[electronic music]] [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] originating in Berlin between Sascha Ring, also known as [[Apparat (musician)|Apparat]], and [[Modeselektor]] members Gernot Bronsert and Sebastian Szary. The band have released four [[studio albums]] to date, their most recent being ''[[More D4ta]]'', released on May 13, 2022. The group was voted "The #1 Live Act of the Year" in 2009 by the readers of ''[[Resident Advisor]]''.
